docs.snippet: Herb Kohl, a former U.S. senator from Wisconsin, is selling the N.B.A. Milwaukee Bucks for $550 million....
docs.lead_paragraph: Herb Kohl, a former U.S. senator from Wisconsin, is selling the N.B.A. Milwaukee Bucks for $550 million.
docs.abstract: Herb Kohl, former United States senator from Wisconsin, is selling the Milwaukee Bucks for $550 million to financiers Marc Lasry and Wesley Edens; deal must be approved by at least 23 of the 30 NBA owners.

headline.seo: Herb Kohl Set to Sell Bucks to Marc Lasry and Wesley Edens
headline.main: Former Senator Is Selling the Bucks After Three Decades
headline.print_headline: Former Senator Is Selling the Bucks After Three Decades

docs.snippet: Before the Knicks’ season finale, a 95-92 win over Toronto, Coach Mike Woodson gave his players advice for the off-season, even though his future was uncertain....
docs.lead_paragraph: Before the Knicks’ season finale, a 95-92 win over Toronto, Coach Mike Woodson gave his players advice for the off-season, even though his future was uncertain.
docs.abstract: Scott Cacciola On Pro Basketball column; New York Knicks coach Mike Woodson's future is uncertain as team president Phil Jackson begins his overhaul of the franchise.

headline.main: Woodson Is Looking to Next Season, but Others’ Eyes Are on Him
headline.print_headline: Woodson Is Looking to Next Season, but Others’ Eyes Are on Him

docs.snippet: The Nets lost to the Cavaliers, 114-85, allowing the Wizards to pass them for the Eastern Conference’s fifth seed. Washington will face the Bulls in the first round of the playoffs while the Nets will travel to Toronto....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Nets lost to the Cavaliers, 114-85, allowing the Wizards to pass them for the Eastern Conference’s fifth seed. Washington will face the Bulls in the first round of the playoffs while the Nets will travel to Toronto.
docs.abstract: Cleveland Cavaliers defeat Brooklyn Nets, 114-85; Nets get 6th playoff seed and will face Toronto Raptors in the first round.

headline.main: Nets Get 6th Seed and Will Face Raptors
headline.print_headline: Nets Get 6th Seed and Will Face Raptors

docs.snippet: Bartering and selling at conventions and online, the thousands of mostly teenage “sneakerheads” have perfected the art of trading up....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bartering and selling at conventions and online, the thousands of mostly teenage “sneakerheads” have perfected the art of trading up.
docs.abstract: Sneaker-obsessed teenagers have formed a thriving subculture using Instagram, Facebook and weekend conventions to spot, sell and trade coveted, sometimes limited-edition pairs of basketball shoes; it is the latest phase of the sports footwear craze that began in the mid-1980s with the debut of Air Jordans.

headline.main: For Young Traders, a Market Where Air Jordans Are Blue Chips
headline.print_headline: At ‘Sneakerhead’ Fairs, Air Jordans Are Golden

docs.snippet: Alisher Usmanov is Russia's richest tycoon for the third year in a row, with wealth of $18.6 billion, after selling his stake in the social media website Facebook, according to the latest report by the U.S. magazine Forbes....
docs.lead_paragraph: Alisher Usmanov is Russia's richest tycoon for the third year in a row, with wealth of $18.6 billion, after selling his stake in the social media website Facebook, according to the latest report by the U.S. magazine Forbes.

headline.main: Billionaire Usmanov Remains Russia's Richest Tycoon: Forbes
headline.print_headline: Billionaire Usmanov Remains Russia's Richest Tycoon: Forbes
